00020 GLWindow::GLWindow(
00021                    QWidget *_parent
00022                   ) :
00023                     QGLWidget(_parent)
00024 {
00025 
00026     SimulationParameters::initialiseCameraParameters(m_eye,m_look,m_upVector);
00027     SimulationParameters::initialiseExportParameters(m_exportEnabled,m_exportPath,m_exportFrameInterval);
00028     // set this widget to have the initial keyboard focus
00029     setFocus();
00030     // re-size the widget to that of the parent (in this case the GLFrame passed in on construction)
00031     this->resize(_parent->size());
00032     m_rotate=true;
00033     m_FluidTimer = startTimer(0);
00034     m_fpsTimer =startTimer(0);
00035     m_fps=0;
00036     m_frames=0;
00037     m_elapsedSimulationTime = 0.0;
00038 
00039     m_elapsedTime = 0.0;
00040 
00041     m_timer.start();
00042     m_iterationTimer.start();
00043 
00044     m_animate = true;
00045     m_iterationProcessed = false;
00046 
00047     m_mouseMove = false;
00048 
00049     //create the integration
00050     m_integrate = new Integrate();
00051 
00052     //create the environment
00053     m_environmentAndRigidBody = new EnvironmentAndRigidBody();
00054 
00055     //create the fluid solver
00056     m_sphSolver = new SPHSolver();
00057 
00058     m_render = new Render();
00059 
00060     if (m_exportEnabled)
00061     {
00062         m_export = new Export(m_exportPath);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 // This virtual function is called once before the first call to paintGL() or resizeGL(),
00067 //and then once whenever the widget has been assigned a new QGLContext.
00068 // This function should set up any required OpenGL context rendering flags, defining display lists, etc.
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 void GLWindow::initializeGL()
00072 {
00073 
00074   glClearColor(0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f);                    // Grey Background
00075   // enable depth testing for drawing
00076   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00077 
00078    // Now we will create a basic Camera from the graphics library
00079    // This is a static camera so it only needs to be set once
00080    // First create Values for the camera position
00081 
00082    ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00083    Init->initGlew();
00084    m_cam= new ngl::Camera(m_eye,m_look,m_upVector,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00085    // set the shape using FOV 45 Aspect Ratio based on Width and Height
00086    // The final two are near and far clipping planes of 0.5 and 10
00087    m_cam->setShape(50,1.0,0.5,150,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00088    m_render->initialiseRender(m_environmentAndRigidBody);
00089 
00090 
00091    glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); // for removal of hidden surfaces
00092 }
00093 
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget has been resized.
00096 // The new size is passed in width and height.
00097 void GLWindow::resizeGL(
00098                         int _w,
00099                         int _h
00100                        )
00101 {
00102   glViewport(0,0,_w,_h);
00103   m_cam->setShape(45,(float)_w/_h,0.001,500,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00104   m_render->updateProjection(m_cam);
00105 }
00106 
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget needs to be painted.
00109 // this is our main drawing routine
00110 void GLWindow::paintGL()
00111 {
00112     // clear the screen and depth buffer
00113     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00114    // build our transform stack
00115     ngl::Transformation trans;
00116     // set the mouse rotation
00117     trans.setRotation(m_spinXFace,m_spinYFace,0);
00118     // set this in the TX stack
00119     m_transformStack.setGlobal(trans);
00120 
00121     m_render->draw(m_environmentAndRigidBody,m_sphSolver,m_transformStack,m_cam);
00122 
00123     if (m_mouseMove == false)
00124     {
00125         m_iterationProcessed = true;
00126     }
00127 
00128     glUseProgramObjectARB(0);
00129     QFont font;
00130     font.setBold(true);
00131     font.setPointSize(10);
00132     glColor3f(0.7,0.7,0.7);
00133 
00134     QString text =QString("Total number of fluid particles : %1").arg(m_sphSolver->getFluidParticleList().size());
00135     renderText(500,20,text,font);
00136 
00137     text =QString("Integration Method used : %1").arg(m_integrate->getIntegrateType().c_str());
00138     renderText(500,40,text,font);
00139 
00140     text =QString("Timestep value : %1").arg(m_integrate->getTimestep());
00141     renderText(500,60,text,font);
00142 
00143     text =QString("Iterations performed per second : %1").arg(m_fps);
00144     renderText(15,20,text,font);
00145 
00146     text =QString("Elapsed time inside the simulation model : %1  seconds").arg(floor(m_elapsedSimulationTime));
00147     renderText(15,40,text,font);
00148 
00149     float tmp = m_iterationTimer.elapsed();
00150     tmp = tmp /  1000;
00151     tmp = tmp * 100;
00152     tmp = floor(tmp);
00153     tmp = tmp / 100;
00154 
00155     text =QString("Time taken to process a single Iteration : %1  seconds").arg(tmp);
00156     renderText(15,60,text,font);
00157     m_iterationTimer.restart();
00158 
00159 }

00161 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 void GLWindow::mouseMoveEvent (
00163                                QMouseEvent * _event
00164                               )
00165 {
00166   // note the method buttons() is the button state when event was called
00167   // this is different from button() which is used to check which button was
00168   // pressed when the mousePress/Release event is generated
00169   if(m_rotate && _event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton)
00170   {
00171     m_spinYFace = ( m_spinYFace + (_event->x() - m_origX) ) % 360 ;
00172     m_spinXFace = ( m_spinXFace + (_event->y() - m_origY) ) % 360 ;
00173     m_origX = _event->x();
00174     m_origY = _event->y();
00175   }
00176   // re-draw GL
00177   m_mouseMove = true;
00178   updateGL();
00179   m_mouseMove = false;
00180 }
00181 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 void GLWindow::mousePressEvent (
00183                                 QMouseEvent * _event
00184                                )
00185 {
00186   // this method is called when the mouse button is pressed in this case we
00187   // store the value where the maouse was clicked (x,y) and set the Rotate flag to true
00188   if(_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00189   {
00190     m_origX = _event->x();
00191     m_origY = _event->y();
00192     m_rotate =true;
00193   }
00194 }
00195 
00196 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 void GLWindow::mouseReleaseEvent (
00198                                   QMouseEvent * _event
00199                                  )
00200 {
00201   // this event is called when the mouse button is released
00202   // we then set Rotate to false
00203   if (_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00204   {
00205     m_rotate=false;
00206   }
00207 }
00208 
00209 void GLWindow::timerEvent(
00210                           QTimerEvent *_event
00211                          )
00212 {
00213         if(_event->timerId() == m_FluidTimer)
00214         {
00215                 if (m_animate ==true)
00216                 {                                        
00217                     if(m_iterationProcessed)
00218                     {
00219                         m_iterationProcessed = false;
00220                         m_elapsedTime = m_elapsedTime + m_integrate->getTimestep();
00221                         m_elapsedSimulationTime += m_integrate->getTimestep();
00222                         ++m_frames;
00223                         m_sphSolver->updateFluid(m_environmentAndRigidBody,m_integrate);
00224                         if (m_exportEnabled)
00225                         {
00226                             if (m_elapsedTime >= m_exportFrameInterval)
00227                             {
00228                             m_export->exportDataOut(m_sphSolver->getFluidNameList(),m_sphSolver->getFluidParticlePositionList(),m_environmentAndRigidBody);
00229                             m_elapsedTime = 0;
00230                             }
00231                         }
00232                         updateGL();
00233                         return;
00234                     }
00235                 }
00236 
00237         }
00238         if(_event->timerId() == m_fpsTimer)
00239           {
00240             if( m_timer.elapsed() > 1000.0)
00241             {
00242               m_fps=m_frames;
00243               m_frames=0;
00244               m_timer.restart();
00245             }
00246            }
00247 }

00249 
00250 //This is a dtor for openGL Window.
00251 // Used for memory management.
00252 GLWindow::~GLWindow()
00253 {
00254     delete m_sphSolver;
00255     delete m_environmentAndRigidBody;
00256     delete m_integrate;
00257 }
